raw_text: BANDARA – THILAK (G.P.K.) former Manager of Grindlays Bank,​ Country Manager of Qantas Airways & Cox and Kings. Dearly beloved husband of Shani,​ loving father of Yohan,​ Tanya and Rajith,​ loving father-in-law of Keiko,​ Vinoth and Nushara,​ loving grandfather of Ashoka,​ Emeni,​ Mila,​ Amaya and Ellie,​ only son of late Mr & Mrs G.P.D. Bandara of Hettipola. Cortege leaves 182/​4 B,​ Sapumal Pedesa,​ off Stanley Tillekeratne Mawatha,​ Nugegoda at 2 p.m. for Cremation at Old Crematorium,​ Borella at 3 p.m. on Saturday 11th November 2023.072971

GOMES – PEARL WINNIFRED. Beloved daughter of the late Lucas and Mary Josephine Gomes,​ sister of the late Anton,​ late Bernard,​ late Felix,​ late Rev. Fr. John,​ late Stanley,​ late Aloysius,​ late Annesley,​ and Leslie and Patrick Gomes,​ passed away peacefully on the 8th November 2023. Remains will lie at Barney Raymonds Funeral Parlour in Borella on Sunday,​ November 12th from 9.00 a.m. to 2.00 p.m. Cortege leaves the Parlour at 2 p.m. on the same day,​ for burial at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (Roman Catholic section).072990
